name: Bionano Genomics, Inc.
description: Bionano Genomics, Inc. is a biotechnology company focused on advancing the field of genomics and transforming the way genetic diseases are diagnosed and treated. Founded in 2003 and headquartered in San Diego, California, Bionano is at the forefront of genome analysis technology with its proprietary Saphyr system. This system utilizes optical mapping technology to provide a comprehensive view of the genome, offering researchers and clinicians insights into structural variations that traditional sequencing methods may miss. Bionano's mission is to improve patient outcomes through the discovery of genomic information that can lead to better diagnostics and personalized treatment plans. The company serves various markets, including clinical diagnostics, research institutions, and pharmaceutical companies, and is dedicated to enhancing scientific understanding of genetic conditions. Bionano is also actively involved in collaborations and partnerships aimed at expanding the application of its technology in oncology and genetic disorders, thereby paving the way for improved therapeutic options. With a strong commitment to innovation, Bionano Genomics is well-positioned to play a significant role in the future of genomics and personalized medicine.
